Text: ...Huh? What is this place?
Graaarf?! Where's my boar?!
(Huh?)

Ugh... It's too bright... Direct sunlight after an
all-nighter is a total no-no...
What happened? I was just in the capital...

It looks like a peaceful countryside. We were
instantaneously transported from our previous
locations... It doesn't make any logical sense.

How strange. We were all in different places, but
now we're all together... Hey, Delta! Where are you
going?!
My boar is still around here somewhere...!

If that dumb dog is going off on her own, then I
might as well do the same. I need to gather intel to
understand our current situation.
No. Please avoid acting alone.
Lady Alpha?!

I don't know why this happened, but it's best if we
stick together for now.
The root cause is likely because Shadow—
Huh?! What was that tremor...a magic collision?

It might be the aftermath of some kind of disturbance
at a distance we can't see, meaning a major battle
could be taking place somewhere nearby.

Is there some strong opponent here? Let's go check
it out!

It might provide us with some insight into the
situation. Let's gather intel while we're on the
move.
Ack... The difference in strength is too great...
Is there no way we can match its level...?
A ragtag bunch of nobodies...
Especially all of you. Hmph... Just filler, really.
...You sure about that?

We're all comrades here! We're not nobodies!
That's why—

We will... I will...join forces with the others and
defeat you...to liberate the people from the
vampires...!
She's right.
Freya...

Today, we end this fight... We won't let the
vampires have their way anymore!

Vampires are also nobodies. Their existence is
insignificant...not that you lot would agree with
me.

...I grow tired of incessant chirping. The more your
numbers increase, the more bothersome it becomes.
Our numbers have increased...?

What in the world... I see familiar faces all around
me.

Where am I...? This doesn't look like the Academy
grounds...
Hey, what's going on?
I-I also have no clue...

You can make sense of things later. Now isn't the
time.
Who are you...?
How long have you been standing there...?
...Doesn't matter. I'll eradicate the lot of you.
*gasp*
This is bad...
Everyone, retreat—!
Not happening!
Duet!
You are too weak to stand in my presence.

Huh, is that my sister and the others? Whew.
Thought I was alone here!
Cid?!
...What a tremendous amount of magic. Who are you?
Now disperse!!!
Ah.
Eeek?!
Wh-What strength!
It's going to blow us away...!
Ci...Cid!!!
